column1: The Pit Room////I can't tell you how thrilled I am to have good bbq so close to all the things I do. I love Killens. It's my fav in Houston
column2: but who wants to trek all the way to Pearland on the reg? Pit Room isn't better than Killens
column5: really good. And they don't mess up your order like Brookstreet. I normally get ribs and sausage with potato salad and mac and cheese
column6: because meat and carbs. No room for veggies.
